story.iWant: to access help or information about the game
story.soThat: I can understand the rules and objectives

tasks.task: Implement modal or dialog to display help content. (AC: 1)
Develop content for game rules, objectives, and other relevant help text. (AC: 1)
Ensure help system is accessible from anywhere in the game. (AC: 1)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am in the game, when I select the "Help" option, then a screen or dialog appears with information about how to play, the current objective, and any other relevant help text.

doc.title: ibe160 - Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: Story 5.2 focuses on providing players with a help/information system to understand game rules and objectives.

doc.title: AI Escape - UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: The help system will be implemented using a Modal Pattern from the UX Design Specification.

constraint.description: Help system accessible from anywhere in the game using a Modal Pattern.
Content for help system needs to be developed and managed (static text files or CMS).

idea.description: Verify "Help" option displays correctly in UI.
Test opening and closing of help modal/dialog.
Verify help content is displayed correctly within the modal.
Test accessibility of help system from various game states.
